description.value: When things go awry, you are quick to pick up everyone's spirits with a word of encouragement or a musical shift. When you roll your @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.kg7VBahhFH6gDFIh]{bardic inspiration} die and your inspired ally still fails, you do not expend a use of bardic inspiration, and your inspiring performance doesn't end.
